Posts.Content: HAS anyone done any of the sperm retrieval methods post prostatectomy and achieved success...?
Posts.Title: Where do sperm go after prostate removal?

Posts.Content: HAS anyone done any of the sperm retrieval methods post prostatectomy and achieved success...?
Posts.Title: Where do sperm go after prostate removal?

Posts.Content: Hi All Somebody may know the answer. I had RP in 2009. I now wish to know if it is possible to have my sperms retrieved in any way so that I can have another child ( intero/text tube etc). Can someone shed light on this ....I dont have a clue...but there may be a way...if so can that info be shared.
Posts.Title: Post radical prostatectomy possibilities for children
